searchingInfo.search: Search github users by inserting desired username and pressing search button.

queryResult.query: Result will display one or more users.
queryResult.profile: Profile user card contains username, profile image and link to more profile information by pressing
queryResult.github: User card also contains small github icon which opens in a new tab github page profile. Icon can be seen here :

profilePage.information: General profile information can be seen on the right and repo list can be seen on the left.
profilePage.repos: Repo list shows by default last created repos but it can be sorted by alphabet by pressing asc or desc button.
profilePage.repo_item: By pressing repo name tab will open with repo on Github page.
